${ModID}:Reoccurrence.DESCRIPTION: Put up to !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Pulse.NAME: Pulse
${ModID}:Pulse.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand cost{!M!|1=s} 0 until played.

${ModID}:Epitaph.NAME: Epitaph
${ModID}:Epitaph.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply starlight:Ruin equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Chronophage.NAME: Chronophage
${ModID}:Chronophage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 12 cards, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.
${ModID}:Chronophage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play 12 cards, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

${ModID}:DustToDust.NAME: Dust to Dust
${ModID}:DustToDust.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! starlight:Ruin. NL starlight:Ruin persists for !Starlight:M2! more turn{!Starlight:M2!|>1=s} on this enemy.

${ModID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${ModID}:Blink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:TimeOut.NAME: Time Out
${ModID}:TimeOut.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
${ModID}:BorrowedTime.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Next turn, NL gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.
